name: Battle Blasters JAM
description:
This game was made in a weekend! Shoot all the enemies and kill the boss to win. Made for a solo game jam. 

Destroy the towers to break the force field.

The enemies can't kill you, but you can kill them! Try to get the best time and share it in the comments!

CONTROLS                                                                                                                                  

  • Mouse click to shoot
  • Right mouse to zoom
  • Q to switch to gun
  • E to switch to teleport
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look

Full screen(ALT + ENTER) for game timer to be shown(otherwise is blocked by app bar)

Share feedback if you want, this was really a learning project. Enjoy!
